languages.text: {n}К'тан, порабощенному тяжким Ярмом, не нужны слова — Он знает, кто теперь Его госпо{mf|дин|жа}, считывает малейшее ваше устремление из разума и, подчиняясь ему, возносит вас вверх. Человеческие чувства заменяются стократно более совершенными способами восприятия мироздания, присущими К'тан. Он — служит, вы — повелеваете.{/n}

{n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}К'тан, порабощенному тяжким Ярмом, не нужны слова — Он знает, кто теперь Его госпо{mf|дин|жа}, считывает малейшее ваше устремление из разума и, подчиняясь ему, возносит вас вверх. Человеческие чувства заменяются стократно более совершенными способами восприятия мироздания, присущими К'тан. Он — служит, вы — повелеваете.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}C'Tan, now enthralled by the heavy Yoke, does not need words — He now knows who His {mf|Master|Mistress} is from now on, reading your mind for the slightest of aspirations and, obeying it, ascends you. The human feelings are replaced by a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe, intrinsic of the C'Tan. You command, and He serves.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}C'Tan, now enthralled by the heavy Yoke, does not need words — He now knows who His {mf|Master|Mistress} is from now on, reading your mind for the slightest of aspirations and, obeying it, ascends you. The human feelings are replaced by a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe, intrinsic of the C'Tan. You command, and He serves.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

The human feelings are replaced by a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe, intrinsic of the C'Tan. You command, and He obliges.{/n}

The human feelings are replaced by a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe, intrinsic of the C'Tan. You command, and He obliges.{/n}

It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Désormais asservi par le poids du Joug, le C'tan n'a pas besoin de mots pour savoir qui est {mf|son nouveau maître|sa nouvelle maîtresse} : il lit dans votre esprit la moindre de vos aspirations et, y obéissant, vous élève. Les sentiments humains sont remplacés par des moyens de percevoir l'univers, intrinsèques au C'tan et cent fois plus parfaits. Vous ordonnez et il obéit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Désormais asservi par le poids du Joug, le C'tan n'a pas besoin de mots pour savoir qui est {mf|son nouveau maître|sa nouvelle maîtresse} : il lit dans votre esprit la moindre de vos aspirations et, y obéissant, vous élève. Les sentiments humains sont remplacés par des moyens de percevoir l'univers, intrinsèques au C'tan et cent fois plus parfaits. Vous ordonnez et il obéit.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}El C'tan, ahora hechizado por el pesado Yugo, no necesita palabras para saber quién es Su nuev{mf|o|a} {mf|amo|ama}. Lee tu mente en busca de la menor aspiración, la cumple y te hace trascender. Las sensaciones humanas quedan reemplazadas por formas cien veces más perfectas de percibir el universo, intrínsecas al C'tan. Tú ordenas y Él obedece.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El C'Tan, ahora hechizado por el pesado Yugo, no necesita palabras: ahora sabe quién es Su nuev{mf|o|a} {mf|amo|ama}. Lee tu mente en busca de la menor aspiración y, al cumplirla, te hace trascender. Las sensaciones humanas quedan reemplazadas por formas cien veces más perfectas de percibir el universo, intrínsecas al C'Tan. Tú ordenas y Él obedece.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}星神碎片已经被圣枷沉重的枷锁束缚住了，不再需要言语。如今，祂已经知道祂的{mf|主人|女主人}是谁。从这一刻起，祂会不断理解你的思想，寻找你心中最微小的愿望，不断实现这些愿望，为你带来擢升。你身为人类的感知，已经被无数种更加完美的方式取代。此刻，你可以通过星神与生俱来的方式理解这个宇宙。你对祂下命令，而祂会服从你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}星神已经被圣枷沉重的枷锁束缚住了，不再需要言语。如今，祂已经知道祂的{mf|主人|女主人}是谁了。从这一刻起，祂会不断理解你的思想，寻找你心中最微小的愿望，不断实现这些愿望，擢升你的地位。你身为人类的感知，已经被无数种更加完美的方式取代。此刻，你可以通过星神与生俱来的方式理解这个宇宙。你对祂下命令，而祂会服从你。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Der C'tan, nun ein Diener des schweren Jochs, braucht keine Worte, um zu wissen, wer {mf|Sein neuer Herr|Seine neue Herrin} ist. Er gräbt in deinem Verstand nach deinen Sehnsüchten, beherzigt sie und erhöht dein Dasein. Menschliche Gefühle weichen hundertfach perfekteren Wegen, das Universum wahrzunehmen, Wegen, die dem C'tan innewohnen. Du befiehlst. Er gehorcht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der C'tan, der nun von dem schweren Joch verzaubert ist, braucht keine Worte: Er weiß von nun an, wer {mf|sein Meister|seine Meisterin} ist, er liest deine Gedanken, erkennt schon den kleinsten Hauch eines Wunschs, und indem er ihm gehorcht, steigt er über dich auf. Die menschlichen Gefühle weichen neuen Wegen, das Universum wahrzunehmen, um ein Hundertfaches perfekteren Wegen, die dem C'tan intrinsisch gegeben sind. Du befiehlst, er gehorcht.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}現在、重い軛に支配されたク＝タンは、その新たな主が誰であるかを知るのに言葉を必要としない。彼は今、あなたのわずかな願望を読み取り、それに従い、あなたの存在を高めるだろう。人間的な感情は、ク＝タンに内在する、宇宙を認識する百倍も完璧な方法に取って代わられる。あなたが命じれば、それは従うだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}現在、重いヨークに心を奪われたク＝タンは、言葉を必要としない。彼は今、自分の主がこれから誰であるかを知り、お前のわずかな願望を読み取り、それに従い、お前を昇天させる。人間的な感情は、ク＝タンに内在する、宇宙を認識する百倍も完璧な方法に取って代わられる。お前が命じれば、主はそれに従おう。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Ağır Boyunduruk'un esiri olan C'tan, yeni efendisinin kim olduğunu bilmek için kelimelere ihtiyaç duymuyor. Zihnindeki en küçük arzuları bile okuyor, onları dinliyor ve varlığını yükseltiyor. İnsan duyguları, evreni algılamanın C'tan'ın doğuştan beri bildiği yüzlerce harika yola dönüşüyor. Emrediyorsun ve sana boyun eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The C'tan, now in thrall to the heavy Yoke, needs no words to know who Its new {mf|master|mistress} is. It reads your mind for the slightest of aspirations, heeds them, and elevates your being. Human feelings give way to a hundredfold more perfect ways of perceiving the universe that are intrinsic to the C'tan. You command. It obeys.{/n}
